The Pride of Britain Awards is one of the hottest tickets on the showbiz calendar as celebs gather to celebrate the country's unsung heroes.

Carol Vorderman will be hosting the awards tonight, while Prince Charles will be on hand to help honour the Pride of Britain winners .

Pride of Britain will be on ITV on Tuesday 5 November, from 8pm until 10pm.

We couldn't resist sharing a sneak peek inside the venue before the celebs sat down to dinner tonight.

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

Ahead of the red carpet arrivals, Instagram snaps live from rehearsals have offered an insight inside the glamorous award's event before the celebrity arrivals.

Behind-the-scenes snaps show off the glittering decor which has been perfectly placed around the swanky room.

While another snap teases a glance at the delicious cuisine that will be served on a Pride of Britain themed menu.

Dazzling chandeliers line the ceilings while a number of luxury round tables fill the floor space.

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

Other snaps show off the award ceremony's brightly lit stage and a glimpse at the backstage preparation in the technical control room.

Another photo teased a glimpse at a branded Pride of Britain chair with statement British detailing emblazoned across the fabric

Eagle-eyed social media users spotted a themed afternoon tea in the background of one of the rehearsal snaps.

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

Other clips from Pride of Britain rehearsals tease a number of acts practising their performances on the shimmering stage.

The stars will be out in force in just a few hours as they prepare to step out onto the red carpet for the glitzy event.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: Behind-the-scenes rehearsal snaps show off a huge swanky stage, glittering decor and a glimmering red carpet
